query:
SELECT a.id, a.phoneNumber, a.service_id, a.status, 
       COUNT(sm.id) as sms_count,
       GROUP_CONCAT(sm.code ORDER BY sm.receivedAt SEPARATOR ' | ') as all_codes,
       GROUP_CONCAT(sm.receivedAt ORDER BY sm.receivedAt SEPARATOR ' | ') as all_dates
FROM activations a
LEFT JOIN sms_messages sm ON sm.activationId = a.id
WHERE a.phoneNumber = '5568933002785'
GROUP BY a.id
ORDER BY a.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5;

       GROUP_CONCAT(sm.code ORDER BY sm.receivedAt SEPARATOR ' | ') as all_codes,
       GROUP_CONCAT(sm.receivedAt ORDER BY sm.receivedAt SEPARATOR ' | ') as all_dates
FROM activations a
LEFT JOIN sms_messages sm ON sm.activationId = a.id
WHERE a.phoneNumber = '5568933002785'
GROUP BY a.id
ORDER BY a.createdAt DESC
